title: Interstellar 10th Anniversary Collector's Edition Preorders Restocked And Discounted At Amazon
description: Interstellar 10th Anniversary Limited Edition Box Set (4K Blu-ray) $53 (was $68) | Releases December 10 Preorder at Amazon Christopher Nolan's sci-fi epic Interstellar is celebrating its 10th anniversary in style with the release of a new collector's edition on December 10. Interstellar 10th Anniversary Limited Edition quickly sold out when it went up for preorder in October, but Amazon just restocked this very cool-looking collector's edition ahead of next week's release. Better yet, Amazon is now offering a nice discount that drops the price from $68 down to $53.Interstellar's 10th Anniversary Limited Edition comes in an oversized box with numerous physical collectibles, and there's even a brand-new special feature.Continue Reading at GameSpot
excerpt: Christopher Nolan's beloved sci-fi film returns next week with a limited-edition 4K Blu-ray box set stuffed with collectibles and bonus content.

html:
GameSpot may receive revenue from affiliate and advertising partnerships for sharing this content and from purchases through links.

Christopher Nolan's sci-fi epic Interstellar is celebrating its 10th anniversary in style with the release of a new collector's edition on December 10. Interstellar 10th Anniversary Limited Edition quickly sold out when it went up for preorder in October, but Amazon just restocked this very cool-looking collector's edition ahead of next week's release. Better yet, Amazon is now offering a nice discount that drops the price from $68 down to $53.

Interstellar's 10th Anniversary Limited Edition comes in an oversized box with numerous physical collectibles, and there's even a brand-new special feature.

Interstellar 10th Anniversary Collector's Edition (4K Blu-ray)

You'll get the following physical collectibles with Interstellar's 10th Anniversary Limited Edition:

  • 5 replica spacesuit patches worn by astronauts on the Endurance spaceship
  • Storyboard booklet with never-before-seen sequence
  • 5 theatrical posters
  • Fold-out slipcase featuring imagery from the film
  • Collector's box for everything above

Interstellar's new Limited-Edition eschews the steelbook case trend in favor of a fold-out slipcase housing the three discs: 4K Blu-ray, 1080p Blu-ray, and Special Features. Walmart's exclusive reprint of Interstellar's Steelbook Edition, which was originally a Target exclusive back in 2014, is slated to release on December 10, too. Unfortunately, Walmart is sold out of preorders (again).

Interstellar's bonus content gets a disc of its own, because there's a lot of it. You can sit back and explore over three hours of extra content, including the brand-new retrospective documentary, The Future Is Now: A Look Back at Interstellar.

In addition to the new documentary, all of the bonus features from the 2017 4K Blu-ray release are included, which is great news. Interstellar was an excellent example of physical media offering a markedly better experience than simply buying a digital copy or streaming it on a service such as Paramount+, where it's available to watch now.

If you don't own Interstellar on 4K, it's worth noting you can get it for $18.51 at Amazon. You'll miss out on the new documentary and collectibles, but you'll have access to hours of bonus content.

Interstellar Special Features

  • The Future Is Now: A Look Back at Interstellar (exclusive to this edition)
  • The Science of Interstellar
  • Plotting an Interstellar Journey
  • Life on Cooper's Farm
  • The Dust featurette
  • Tars and Case featurette
  • The Cosmic Sounds of 'Interstellar
  • The Space Suits
  • The Endurance featurette
  • Shooting in Iceland: Miller's Planet/Mann's Planet
  • The Ranger and the Lander
  • Miniatures in Space
  • The Simulation of Zero-G
  • Celestial Landmarks
  • Across All Dimensions and Time
  • Trailers

Released after he'd wrapped up work on the Dark Knight trilogy, Interstellar is a fascinating film that explores if humanity has a future among the stars. Packed with an ensemble cast led by Matthew McConaughey, the film takes a very grounded look at space exploration, the hazards of outer space, and there's even a dash of time-travel thrown into the mix. If you're a fan of practical effects, cool spacesuits, and at least one robot that looks like a mechanical Kit-Kat, you'll get a kick out of this movie.

At the global box office, Interstellar pulled in roughly $700 million, not too shabby for an original film from an era where Marvel movies, remakes, and sequels were at the top of the charts. In addition to McConaughey, Interstellar also starred Jessica Chastain, Anne Hathaway, Matt Damon, John Lithgow, Michael Caine, Timoth√©e Chalamet, Ellen Burstyn, Bill Irwin, Wes Bentley, David Oyelowo, and Casey Affleck.

If you're looking to add a few more of Nolan's movies to your Blu-ray collection, the majority of them are available in 4K formats.

More Christopher Nolan Movies

If you're looking to add a few more of Nolan's movies to your Blu-ray collection, the majority of them are available in 4K formats. Oppenheimer, which won Best Picture at the 2024 Oscars, received a new Walmart-exclusive steelbook edition on November 19.

  • Memento (Blu-ray)
  • Insomnia (Blu-ray)
  • The Dark Knight Trilogy (4K Blu-ray)
  • The Prestige (4K Blu-ray)
  • Inception (4K Blu-ray)
  • Interstellar (4K Blu-ray)
  • Dunkirk (4K Blu-ray)
  • Tenet (4K Blu-ray)
  • Oppenheimer (4K Blu-ray)
  • Oppenheimer Limited-Edition Steelbook (4K Blu-ray)
